text: Bamwe	bishwe	n’Abamarayika	mugihe	bahemukiye	imitima	yabo, bazobwirwa bati:- mbega mwari mumerewe gute? Nabo bazobishura bati:- ntabushobozi twari dufise kuri iyi Si, nabo bazovuga bati:- none Isi y’Imana ntiyari yagutse kugira ngo mwimukire muriyo, rero abo ubwicaro bwabo nubwo mumuriro udahera, nayo n’ingaruka mbi cane
